description: A specialized laboratory room within Punk Hazard's research facility where Caesar Clown manufactures SAD, the chemical substance used to create artificial Devil Fruits. The room contains a large metal vault and production machinery.

keyEvents.title: Smoker vs Vergo Battle in SAD Room
keyEvents.description: Vice Admiral Smoker and Vice Admiral Vergo engage in intense combat within the SAD Production Room.
keyEvents.significance: The battle in this room represents the clash between true Marines and corrupted infiltrators, with the fate of Caesar's SAD production at stake.

statusHistory.reason: Room is operational and producing SAD during this episode

description: A section of the Punk Hazard research facility that has been heavily damaged from battles. This corridor area connects to C-block and D-block and becomes compromised when Shinokuni gas enters through a ruptured tank.

keyEvents.title: Sanji and Tashigi Navigate B-Block
keyEvents.description: Sanji, Tashigi, and G-5 Marines make their way through the battle-damaged B-block section.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the cooperation between Straw Hats and Marines while building tension in the damaged facility.

keyEvents.title: Shinokuni Gas Enters B-Block
keyEvents.description: A gas tank ruptures allowing the deadly Shinokuni to flood into the corridor where the characters are located.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces immediate mortal danger and forces evacuation, raising the stakes dramatically.

statusHistory.reason: Building sustained heavy damage from previous battles and is now filling with poisonous gas

description: A section of the Punk Hazard facility that was originally Dr. Vegapunk's personal laboratory before the catastrophic incident. Caesar Clown has set up this area as a trap, filling it with additional poisonous gas to eliminate intruders.

keyEvents.title: Vegapunk's Former Laboratory Revealed
keyEvents.description: Section R is revealed to have been Dr. Vegapunk's laboratory, containing his advanced research equipment and experiments.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the connection between Vegapunk and Punk Hazard, explaining the advanced research conducted on the island.

statusHistory.reason: Former Vegapunk laboratory now used by Caesar as a trap location

description: The basement level of the Punk Hazard research facility where experimental subjects and prisoners were kept. This is where Luffy discovers Momonosuke trapped in his dragon form.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Discovers the Talking Dragon
keyEvents.description: Luffy finds a small dragon in the basement that can speak human language, later revealed to be Momonosuke.
keyEvents.significance: This discovery leads to the revelation of artificial Devil Fruits and Momonosuke's identity.

statusHistory.reason: Basement area is being explored by Luffy during this episode
